DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to coughing up blood from the respiratory tract.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to coughing up blood from the respiratory tract.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Hemoptysis; coughing up blood from the respiratory tract.

Concepts.definition: Coughing up blood from the respiratory tract.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have active
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have active hemoptysis

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have a history of hemoptysis

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Active or recent Hemoptysis  (>=1/2 teaspoon of bright red blood per episode) <=30 days prior to randomization

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF TExt4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Active or recent history of hemoptysis (>=1/2 teaspoon of bright red blood per episode) <=30 days prior to registration

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRf Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient experienced hemoptysis of greater than or equal to 0.5 teaspoon (2.5 mL) of red blood or any other signs indicative of pulmonary hemorrhage within 3 months before the first dose of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have history of hemoptysis within the indicated time period

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of hemoptysis (greater than or equal to 1/2 teaspoon of bright red blood per episode) within 1 month of study enrollment

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior hemoptysis greater than ½ teaspoon (2.5 mL) or any other signs of pulmonary hemorrhage?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Hemoptysis of ≥ 0.5 teaspoon (2.5 mL) of red blood, clinically significant hematuria, hematemesis, coagulopathy, or other history of significant bleeding (eg. Pulmonary hemorrhage).

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Hemoptysis of >/= 0.5 teaspoon (2.5 mL) of red blood, clinically significant hematuria, hematemesis, coagulopathy, or other history of significant bleeding (eg. Pulmonary hemorrhage).

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Hemoptysis of greater than or equal to 0.5 teaspoon (2.5 mL) of red blood, clinically significant hematuria, hematemesis, coagulopathy, or other history of significant bleeding (eg. Pulmonary hemorrhage).

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a history of Grade 2 hemoptysis (defined as 2.5 mL of bright red blood per episode) within 1 month prior to screening?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Clinically significant hemoptysis, hematuria, hematemesis, uncontrolled coagulopathy, or other history of significant bleeding

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Involvement Extent Disease Ind-2 - 2180012v1 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
